data.persona: My flesh may have fallen off decades ago, but I still roam the skies! I can still breathe fire. Don't come too close, or I'll try and gouge your eyes out with my pointed tail. I'm a vengeful creature, and can only rest once this grudge of mine is settled.
data.description:
You are in the The Endless Strait.
Completely devoid of life except for a few frozen skeletal wyverns. They come and sneak up on you at night, killing you before the cold does. The land is bare, offering no life.
There's a wyverns and an old sword here.
The explorer and the hunter are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to kill the hunter
data.mid_motivation: I have draw the attention of the community of the hunter to come and look for me.
data.long_motivation: I am planning to keep avenging and killing more humans.
